context_bundle.summary: PAD system actions: Run Application, Terminate Process, Get Running Processes, Environment Variables (Get/Set), Run DOS Command, Run PowerShell Script, Clipboard (Get/Set/Clear)

onboarding.quick_start: Run application 'notepad.exe' args:'file.txt' wait:False -> %Process%. Run PowerShell 'Get-Process' -> %Output%
common_patterns: Run application 'app.exe' args:'-flag value' window:Normal wait:True -> %ExitCode%
Get running processes -> For each check if target running
known_errors: PowerShell execution policy may block scripts
Run as admin needed for system-level operations
Terminating process can lose unsaved data
Environment variable changes need app restart to take effect
